meanings.definition: A person who creates or applies lather.
meanings.sent1: The latherers at the barbershop whipped up a foamy lather for the shave.
meanings.sent2: The latherers in the soap factory work diligently to produce high-quality lather.
meanings.sent3: The latherers at the car wash accidentally sprayed foam all over themselves, creating a bubbly mess.
meanings.sent4: The chef was a master latherer, skillfully whipping up creamy lather for the dessert topping.
meanings.sent5: The latherers in the movie set recreated a snowy scene using their lather skills.

meanings.sent1: The group of latherers gathered around the sink, each with their own shaving brush.
meanings.sent2: The latherers chatted happily as they prepared the rich lather for the customers.
meanings.sent3: The latherers formed a team to compete in the annual lather-making contest.
meanings.sent4: The latherers' hands moved swiftly, creating a sea of bubbles in the basin.
meanings.sent5: The latherers' expertise was evident in the smoothness of the shaving cream they produced.
